scripts.deploy:local: export ENV=LOCAL && npm run build:api && npm run sam-package -- --profile losonczil && npm run sam-deploy -- --profile losonczil
scripts.deploy:ci: export ENV=CI && npm run build:api && npm run sam-package -- --profile ci && npm run sam-deploy -- --profile ci
scripts.sam-deploy: sam deploy -t packaged.cf.foci2020.yaml --stack-name foci2020-${ENV} --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --parameter-overrides Env=${ENV} TestUserPassword=${CYPRESS_PASSWORD:-'""'} AdminUserEmail=${ADMIN_USER_EMAIL}
